clean_data: Business Analyst Business Analyst Business Analyst Project Manager New York NY Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Business Analyst UBS Financial Service Jersey City NJ August 2019 to Present Freelance BNY Mellon March 2017 to Present Freelance Consultant Providing business analysis support to organizations looking to build or enhance present IT structure to improve internal and external procedures such as reporting payments etc Business Analyst Enterprise BNY MellonPershing Jersey City NJ February 2018 to January 2019 by providing analysis support to midlevel to large projects using the NetX suite or inhouse applications Responsible for eliciting business requirements from business users and subject matter experts define and document requirements write functional specifications and perform business process design in conjunction with operations team Serve as liaison between the internalexternal business community and the IT organization in order to provide technical solutions to meet user needs Lead requirements validation and traceability analysis manage scope and requirements throughout the project lifecycle and translates business requirements into functional specifications for the IT organization Worked with external vendor Financial National Information Services FIS to elicit requirements needed to retrieve and send account data to carry out projects that required client statement customization Worked with front and middle office teams to identify nonexempt borrower firm accounts are monitored and stipulated charges under the US Regulation T FINRA 15c3 and 4210 requirements Business Analysis Project Management JP Morgan Chase Asset Management New York NY April 2013 to March 2017 Worked within Asset Management Risk Technology division to build out global risk reporting tool AM Exceptions Risk Report for Global Wealth Management GWM and Global Investment Management GIM portfolio managers to better monitor risk exposure within AM by improving reporting traceability payments and accountabilityThe digital reporting tool function as a subset to the Asset Management larger dashboard project As the business analyst I worked alongside senior project managers to ensure the digital reporting tool feed into the planned which involved checking data and fields from the application fed to the QlikView dashboard Project involved collaborating with the business stakeholder to push efforts to standardize approval reporting process within Global Investment Banking and Wealth Management teams by identifying inconsistent practices used by end users through data mapping and workflow documentation Work with Risk Tech developers 8 persons with organizing the application build time setting up QAUAT and user interface designs to implement an inhouse built risk reporting tool on PEGA Systems platform Provided manual test support in QA and assisted with preparing test scripts for regression test in Selenium Supported UAT cycle by tracking any defects reported by the testers Coordinated with downstream applications to setup connection to the reporting application to automate transactions for Private Bank division to directly reconcile with SAP OMNI and DDA accounting systems eliminating manual entry from journal team Utilize the agile methodology on JIRA software to collect business requirements manage change requests and organize monthly sprint releases increasing teams productivity Prepared business requirement documents BRD for stakeholders and upper management review to manage expectation on application functionality build and test plan Written business requirement documents which include procedures for data governance such as how the data will be stored procedures take place in an event system experience downtime user entitlements to the system and data archive Leverage excel pivot table to analyze data held maintained in database to help assist business stakeholders to decided fields to maintain or remove from data migration Provided project management services with negotiating schedule deliverables among the technology teams Work with senior project manager to strategize best method to use IT developers skills to meet the business needs and deliver product in a timely manner Consultant FDM Group New York NY October 2010 to October 2014 Worked onsite with clients to perform business analysis functions including stakeholder analysis GAP analysis and developing strategic solutions Assisted FDM Account Management Department with investigating application to improve prospecting strategies such as Salesforce Utilize Salesforce to assist account managers with prospecting new clients by identifying the market needs by collecting data from the FDM Academy candidate pool to evaluate current technologies clients seek and advise the academic department areas where training is needed Provided administrative duties to the Academy and Sales team by monitoring internal trainees including tracking internal trainees timesheets and verifying references prepared documentation for seminars and exam registration Junior IT Project Manager Credit Suisse New York NY July 2012 to January 2013 Operated as junior IT project manager for the Client Reference Data team with assisting with overseeing the project involved enriching database in compliance to the requirements set by the organization and federal regulators Act at the point of contact in the NY office with senior IT project manager to collect negotiate and distribute requirements to Client Reference Data IT teams for preparation global decommission databases containing client reference data Worked with IT business analyst to carry out governance and data management such as data mapping on extract sent by the business to identify invalidNULL data fields determine fields to be used as unique identifiers for Legal Entity Identifier LEI application and find the appropriate custodians and data managers to decide how the data will be managed in the new system Worked with project managers to review and negotiate terms on business requirement documents BRD functional requirement document FRD and functional specification documents FSD to ensure data mapping presented by the business contained no inconsistencies to prevent bad data migrating to new database Maintained weekly goliverunbooks for IT development team detailing migration deployment from client database to temporary database impacting over 100 users Prepared and distributed biweekly project status reports for CS Ref Data department to upper management and senior program managers Carried out workshops training CS Ref Data project managers and business analysts to use inhouse SharePoint application to track project deliverables on SharePoint Performed database analysis to troubleshoot data queries presented by downstream users Education Bachelor of Science in Business Administration Suffolk University Boston MA 2009 Skills Outlook Scheduling Estimating Maintenance Excel testing SQL CertificationsLicenses ITIL v3 Present Assessments Intermediate Spreadsheet Proficiency with Microsoft Excel Highly Proficient January 2019 Measures a candidates knowledge of intermediate Microsoft Excel techniques including effectively writing and applying conditional formulas Full results
